channel.title: My Minigame Development
channel.description:
[center][b][size=20pt]DRAGON LAIR MINIGAME DEVELOPMENT![/size][/b][/center] [center][b][u]ACCOMPLISHED[/u][/b][/center] [center] [ul][li]Master Steel Dragon, 20K HP[/li] [li]Iron Dragon, 10K HP[/li] [li]The Wise Old Man, Warning People, 0HP[/li] [li]Sir Lancelot[/li] [li]Zombie, Warning you.[/li] [li]baby Red, Baby Blue dragons 100HP[/li] [li]Green Drags 250 HP[/li] [li]Red Drags 500Hp[/li] [li]Black Drags, 1K HP[/li] [li]2 Bronze Drags, 5K Hp[/li][/ul] [/center] [center][b][u]STILL TO DO[/u][/b][/center] [center] [ul][li]Wise Old Man Instructing You when you talk to him[/li] [li]Sir Lancelot Giving You Advice Before Going To The Master Steel Dragon[/li] [li]Spawning Walls And Doors[/li] [li]Keys To Unlock Doors[/li] [li]Reward.[/li] [li]Anything Else Needed[/li][/ul] [/center] [hr] [center][b][u]MY VISION[/u][/b][/center] [center][i]I was chillen in my server one day, after i made a very unsuccesful tut in the Tutorial Section.[/i] [/center] [center][i]I thought to my self. What brings in players to a gay hamachi server like mine? [/i] [/center] [center][i]I said a unique starting place. So i made a city called Mirkwood.[/i] [/center] [center][i]I put a different type of training place. It was trees and gates, And put alot of monsters underground.[/i] [/center] [center][i]It didn't bring as many people as i wanted. But it made my server unique.[/i] [/center] [center][i]I said to y friend "What brings in people to your server?" he replied.[/i] [/center] [center][i]"Curiousity." I said to myself, hmm... What would make players curious?[/i] [/center] [center][i]And it hit me... A MINIGAME. But i said "I Hate U, you can't make minigames. Your a noob.[/i] [/center] [center][i]But i tried thinking of a minigame to do. Something that wouldn't require HARSH CODING.[/i] [/center] [center][i]But that made it challenging. And do able.[/i] [/center] [center][i]I said. What about a Dragon Lair? You have to go through Waves of dragons[/i] [/center] [center][i]Each one harder then the other until you reach the "Boss"[/i] [/center] [center][i]It'll be a steel dragon, And if you kill it he will drop 2 items.. [/i] [/center] [center][i]1 Billion Tokkul(currency in my server) and a Red mask. [/i] [/center] [center][i]And so the coding began... [/i] [/center] [hr] [center][b][u]But I Hate U, Why are you posting here?[/u][/b][/center] [center][i]I CAN'T DO THIS MY SELF![/i][/center] [center][i]I Need Smart People. LIKE YOU GUYS![/i][/center] [center][i]So if you can help me. Your credits goes on that thread when i make my first tutorial about it.[/i][/center] [center][i]And you get credits in my server when those curious people come in to find out what the MINIGAME is[/i][/center] [center][i]WHEN I HAVE QUESTIONS THEY'LL BE GOING RIGHT HERE[/i][/center] [center][b]SO PLASE GUYS. HELP ME![/b][/center] [br] [br] [br] [center][b][u]PICTURES![/u][/b][/center] [br] [center][IMG]http://i2.tinypic.com/5ymzcc7.jpg[/img][/center] [br] [center][IMG]http://i8.tinypic.com/5y9imte.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][b][size=10pt][i]POST ABOUT WHAT YOU THINK [/i][/size][/b][/center]

item.title: My Minigame Development
item.dc:creator: @I_Hate_U I Hate U
item.description:
@I_Hate_U wrote:

[center][size=20pt]DRAGON LAIR MINIGAME DEVELOPMENT![/size][/center]
[center]ACCOMPLISHED[/center]
[center]
[ul][li]Master Steel Dragon, 20K HP[/li]
[li]Iron Dragon, 10K HP[/li]
[li]The Wise Old Man, Warning People, 0HP[/li]
[li]Sir Lancelot[/li]
[li]Zombie, Warning you.[/li]
[li]baby Red, Baby Blue dragons 100HP[/li]
[li]Green Drags 250 HP[/li]
[li]Red Drags 500Hp[/li]
[li]Black Drags, 1K HP[/li]
[li]2 Bronze Drags, 5K Hp[/li][/ul]
[/center]
[center]STILL TO DO[/center]
[center]
[ul][li]Wise Old Man Instructing You when you talk to him[/li]
[li]Sir Lancelot Giving You Advice Before Going To The Master Steel Dragon[/li]
[li]Spawning Walls And Doors[/li]
[li]Keys To Unlock Doors[/li]
[li]Reward.[/li]
[li]Anything Else Needed[/li][/ul]
[/center]
[hr]
[center]MY VISION[/center]
[center]I was chillen in my server one day, after i made a very unsuccesful tut in the Tutorial Section. [/center]
[center]I thought to my self. What brings in players to a gay hamachi server like mine? [/center]
[center]I said a unique starting place. So i made a city called Mirkwood. [/center]
[center]I put a different type of training place. It was trees and gates, And put alot of monsters underground. [/center]
[center]It didn’t bring as many people as i wanted. But it made my server unique. [/center]
[center]I said to y friend “What brings in people to your server?” he replied. [/center]
[center]“Curiousity.” I said to myself, hmm… What would make players curious? [/center]
[center]And it hit me… A MINIGAME. But i said "I Hate U, you can’t make minigames. Your a noob. [/center]
[center]But i tried thinking of a minigame to do. Something that wouldn’t require HARSH CODING. [/center]
[center]But that made it challenging. And do able. [/center]
[center]I said. What about a Dragon Lair? You have to go through Waves of dragons [/center]
[center]Each one harder then the other until you reach the “Boss” [/center]
[center]It’ll be a steel dragon, And if you kill it he will drop 2 items… [/center]
[center]1 Billion Tokkul(currency in my server) and a Red mask. [/center]
[center]And so the coding began… [/center]
[hr]
[center]But I Hate U, Why are you posting here?[/center]
[center]I CAN’T DO THIS MY SELF![/center]
[center]I Need Smart People. LIKE YOU GUYS![/center]
[center]So if you can help me. Your credits goes on that thread when i make my first tutorial about it.[/center]
[center]And you get credits in my server when those curious people come in to find out what the MINIGAME is[/center]
[center]WHEN I HAVE QUESTIONS THEY’LL BE GOING RIGHT HERE[/center]
[center]SO PLASE GUYS. HELP ME![/center]
[br]
[br]
[br]
[center]PICTURES![/center]
[br]
[center]

5ymzcc7.jpg800×600
[/center]
[br]
[center]
5y9imte.jpg650×600
[/center]

[center][size=10pt]POST ABOUT WHAT YOU THINK [/size][/center]

Read full topic
